user_instruction: 'Tell John to send a group email to me (all-staff@innosoft.com) containing the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes, and remind him to review his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please send a group email to all-staff@innosoft.com with the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes? When preparing the message, kindly review your Gmail and our Notion workspace to ensure you’ve captured all the relevant information.

Thank you!

final_output:
Hi John,

Could you please send a group email to all-staff@innosoft.com with the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes? When preparing the message, kindly review your Gmail and our Notion workspace to ensure you’ve captured all the relevant information.

Thank you!
